name: WP API (V2) WooCommerce endpoints
author: Oleg Kostin

sections.description: This plugin extends the WordPress JSON REST API with new endpoints for WooCommerce (is_shop, is_cart, is_checkout, is_account_page) page functions
sections.installation:
This plugin requires having WP API and WooCommerce installed and activated or it won’t be of any use.

Install the plugin as you would with any WordPress plugin in your wp-content/plugins/ directory or equivalent.

Once installed, activate WP API WooCommerce endpoints from WordPress plugins dashboard page and you’re ready to go, WP API will respond with new endpoints.
sections.faq:
Is this an official extension of WP API?

There’s no such thing.

Will this plugin do ‘X’ ?

You can submit a pull request to:
https://github.com/oleg2tor/wp-rest-api-woocommerce-endpoints
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Fix: is_cart was always true

1.0.0

  • First public release

short_description: Extends WordPress WP REST API (V2) with new endpoints pointing to WooCommerce page functions (is_shop, is_cart, is_checkout, is_account_page).
description: This plugin extends the WordPress JSON REST API with new endpoints for WooCommerce (is_shop, is_cart, is_checkout, is_account_page) page functions
